faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions asked by clients. If you have other questions, feel free to contact me.

questions.q: What types of services do you offer?
questions.a: I offer full-stack web development services including frontend and backend development, responsive design, API development, database design and optimization, performance tuning, and technical consulting.

questions.q: How long does a project typically take?
questions.a: Project timeline depends on complexity and scope of requirements. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex web application could take 2-6 months. I provide detailed time estimates before starting a project.

questions.q: How do you ensure project quality?
questions.a: I follow industry best practices including code reviews, automated testing, continuous integration, and deployment processes. I focus on code quality, performance optimization, and security to ensure delivery of products that meet high standards.

My process typically includes requirements analysis, solution design, development implementation, testing, and deployment phases. I value communication and provide regular progress updates to ensure the project stays on track.

questions.q: Do you provide maintenance and support services?
questions.a: Yes, I offer maintenance and support services after project completion, including bug fixes, feature updates, and performance optimizations. Long-term maintenance contracts can be arranged based on your needs.
